product_name: The North Face Logo Full-Zip Hoodie - Men's
long_description: A classic hoodie for outdoor enthusiasts, The North Face Logo Full-Zip hoodie is great to wear on or off the trail to take the chill out of a cool day or evening. You'll stay nice and warm beneath the soft blend of 80% cotton and 20% polyester fleece. Hand pockets provide excellent warmth and plenty of room to stow essentials. Rib-knit cuffs and hem. The North Face Logo Full-Zip hoodie has a relaxed fit.
short_description: A classic hoodie for outdoor enthusiasts, The North Face Logo Full-Zip hoodie is great to wear on or off the trail to take the chill out of a cool day or evening.
